stories.text: Imagine some changes in protocol which converts Bitcoin's blockchain in some kind of AI which makes some decisions on humankind. Algorithmic part of questions may be ignored, this is a question about introducing a human values to Artificial Intelligence.

stories.text:
I am wondering if any has experience walking away completely from software engineering.

As an example i am thinking of becoming a carpenter after 7 years of stress doing software development and infrastructure.
stories.title: Ask HN: Experience Leaving Software Engineering

stories.text: Given that the career growth is almost never transparent and is usually very complicated within any big/profitable enough hi-tech software company, and at the same time any L8+ vacancy you see requires experience in the same role — how does one become a director of engineering these days?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you become an Engineering Director / CTO in a big enough company?
